alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:28PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL RANDOLPH COUNTY... At 127 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Biggers, or 10 miles northeast of Pocahontas, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Reyno... Biggers... Stokes... Brockett... Engelerg... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
